description: With over 27 years of experience, White Wings Group has delivered 13+ residential, commercial, and land development projects across Surat. We are proud to have developed White Wings Torrance, the cityâ€™s first IGBC pre-certified Platinum Green Building, and ensure every project follows RERA guidelines for transparency.
